participant_1.name: Liam Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, with a love for music and storytelling.
participant_1.background: i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry. we spent summers ring at national parks. i'm a country music singer.

participant_2.name: Sophie Reynolds
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys connecting with others and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: i've three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.

content.text: Hey! Are you a country music singer? Because I am.
